sections.title: Ability Scores Overview
sections.description: Basic introduction to the six ability scores, their ranges, and how they affect character abilities

sections.title: Generating Ability Scores
sections.description: All methods for generating ability scores including Standard, Classic, Heroic, Dice Pool, and Purchase methods, plus ability score costs and campaign point values

sections.title: Abilities and Spellcasters
sections.description: How ability scores affect spellcasting, including bonus spells per day table and minimum ability requirements for casting

sections.title: Strength (Str)
sections.description: Complete rules for Strength including what it affects, temporary/permanent bonuses, ability damage, carrying capacity table with examples and descriptions

sections.title: Dexterity (Dex)
sections.description: Complete rules for Dexterity including what it affects, temporary/permanent bonuses, ability damage, and examples table

sections.title: Constitution (Con)
sections.description: Complete rules for Constitution including hit points, Fortitude saves, temporary/permanent bonuses, ability damage, and special rules for constructs and undead

sections.title: Intelligence (Int)
sections.description: Complete rules for Intelligence including skill points, bonus languages, wizard spells, temporary/permanent bonuses, ability damage, and special rules for different creature types

sections.title: Wisdom (Wis)
sections.description: Complete rules for Wisdom including Will saves, cleric/druid/ranger spells, temporary/permanent bonuses, ability damage, and related skills

sections.title: Charisma (Cha)
sections.description: Complete rules for Charisma including social skills, bard/paladin/sorcerer spells, channel energy, temporary/permanent bonuses, and ability damage

sections.title: Ability Score Bonuses
sections.description: Rules for temporary and permanent ability score increases, including how they affect skills, saves, and spell DCs

sections.title: Ability Score Damage
sections.description: Complete rules for ability score damage including penalties, unconsciousness, death, and healing, with effects for each ability score

sections.title: Ability Score Penalties
sections.description: Rules for temporary ability score penalties that function like ability damage but cannot cause unconsciousness or death

sections.title: Ability Drain
sections.description: Rules for ability drain which permanently reduces ability scores and can cause loss of skill points, hit points, and other bonuses
